channel.title: Login box glitch
channel.description:
Hey I downloaded Bluurs client and behind the login box is the map background sprite (mapback.png). I wondered what would of happened if I removed the sprite from the client folder and it was removed but when I logged in to the server the sprite was also gone too so that was a problem. I added it back in and still unsure on how to remove it from behind the login box.
Top left corner: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2qk2vdx.jpg[/img]

item.title: Login box glitch
item.dc:creator: @Intimidation Intimidation
item.description:
@Intimidation wrote:

[quote=“giovannimoonen, post:2, topic:413168”]jajajajjajajajajaja.
hard to fix
i should download mezzy cliwnt best
but you can download otther clients of you want :)[/quote]

Not only was it hard to understand what you were saying but it’s not really helping my situation.

Thank you for your efforts? o-O
